short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for Kut.Cards debate card cutting website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kut is a tool created by Kut. Cards. Kut is created to help debaters gather evidence faster in and outside of round. Kut works by downloading a provided URL. After receiving this URL Kut summaries, the arguments within the article and bolds and underlines them. The user is then provided a DOCX file that is in the currently accepted document format for evidence-based debate formats such as LD, Public Forum, and Policy debate. Kut can be used to help cut down on the time needed for debate research.
